Equity.description: Search for Ordinary Shares of a particular exchange.

exchange_name.description: Name of the exchange where this equity is traded. For example: 'London Stock Exchange', 'Euronext Paris', 'Shanghai Stock Exchange', 'The Toronto Stock Exchange', 'NYSE Consolidated', etc.

request_body.Filter: AssetState ne 'DC' and SearchAllCategoryv2 eq 'Equities' {{if exchange_name is defined}} and ExchangeName xeq '#{exchange_name}'{{endif}} and RCSAssetCategoryGenealogy eq 'A:1L'

Mines.description: Find coordinates of mines in a region.

commodity.description: Commodity extracted from the mine. For example: 'Gold', 'Nickel', 'Zinc', 'Cooper', 'Palladium', 'Lead', etc.

region.description: Region to search in. For example: 'Botswana', 'Brazil', 'Canada', 'Chile', 'Costa Rica', 'Cuba', 'United States', 'Guyana', 'Peru', 'South Africa', etc

request_body.Filter: RCSAssetTypeLeaf eq 'Mine' {{if commodity is defined}} and RCSCommodityTypeLeaf xeq '#{commodity}'{{endif}} {{if region is defined}} and RCSRegionLeaf eq '#{region}'{{endif}}

VesselsBoundFor.description: Search for vessels heading to a destination.

request_body.Filter: AISStatus ne null and AISStatus ne 'Moored' and AISStatus ne '*defined*' {{if destination is defined}} and DestinationPort eq '#{destination}'{{endif}}

UnderlyingQuoteRIC eq '#{ric}' and RCSAssetCategoryLeaf eq 'Option' and IsChain eq false {{if strike_price is defined}} and StrikePrice eq #{strike_price}{{endif}} {{if expiry_date}} and ExpiryDate eq #{expiry_date}{{endif}} {{if put_call}} and CallPutOption eq '#{put_call}'{{endif}} {{if contract_type}} and ContractType eq '#{contract_type}'{{endif}}
RicRoot eq '#{_.GetRoot.RicRoot.0}' and RCSAssetCategoryLeaf xeq 'Equity Future' and IsChain eq false and AssetStateName eq 'Active' and DisplayType ne 'CONTN'
